import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../styles/StatusTable.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FiltInfoTable(){const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);// Fetch filtinfo data
